post.body: @p2p 大神 #话题  好像不支持中文哦 ，英文 #AAAA 可以？是不是？

中文 #话题 #大事件 #趣闻  #零网  . #ZeroMePlus #NewFeature #ProjectUpdate ，我们可以话题了，不过zerome+开发者把话题更近一步了，改成了搜索一切推内容。。。
。。 #我要吐槽  为什么谷歌要把亲儿子的名字 NEXUS 改成 PIXEL呢，nexus多好听，中文也好听“萘科瑟斯”  ，pixel 中文就不好听了，强烈鄙视谷歌的印度人CEO劈叉。

ZeroNet Rev1534

ZeroBlog Changelog, October 4, 2016
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:95
27 minutes ago 
Rev1534

Push updates to newer clients first
Fix diff sending bug (been chasing it for a long time)
Bad file reset improvements
Fix random publish errors when json file contained [] characters
Rewritten uPnP port opener + close port on exit (Thanks to sirMackk!)
Currently working on optional file enhancements:

Global optional file cache limit: if the defined the limit is reached the most seeded files will be automatically deleted
Sign up to auto help distribute specific user's files
Web interface to follow per-file uploaded amount/set global limit/pin files/etc.
ZeroFrame API command to query peer number for specific files
The demo for this features probably will be image upload for ZeroMe
It could also allow future big file support
Eta: 2-3wk

Uruguay urges ex-Guantanamo detainee to end hunger strike
MONTEVIDEO (Reuters) - Uruguay on Friday urged a former Guantanamo prisoner demanding to be reunited with his family to end a two-month-old hunger strike and said it was trying to transfer him to another country.

A woman will not lead the U.N. now, but equality fight continues
UNITED NATIONS (Reuters) - About a third of the United Nations staff are women, but the higher you go, the fewer you will find in the world body, which has had eight male leaders in its 71 years, and next week is expected to approve Portugal's Antonio Guterres as its ninth secretary-general.

Chilean President Bachelet shows deep emotion at human rights event
SANTIAGO (Reuters) - Chilean President Michelle Bachelet recalled with deep emotion the torture of her father and in a public appearance on Friday recognized the role of the state in human rights violations during the country's 1973-1990 military dictatorship.

Nigeria's northern Kaduna state declares Shi'ite Muslim sect unlawful
ABUJA (Reuters) - A northern Nigerian state on Friday said it declared a minority Shi'ite Muslim sect, whose members clashed with the army late last year, an unlawful society.

Venezuela creates Hugo Chavez peace prize, awards to Russia's Putin
CARACAS (Reuters) - Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro on Friday announced the creation of peace prize in honor of late socialist leader Hugo Chavez, and said he was awarding it to Russian President Vladimir Putin.

U.S. embassy in Congo says family members can return after evacuation
KINSHASA (Reuters) - Family members of U.S. personnel in Democratic Republic of Congo can return to the country, the U.S. embassy said late on Friday, one week after ordering them to leave over safety concerns related to the volatile political climate.

Brazil's top prosecutor urges Congress to shelve spending cap
BRASILIA (Reuters) - Brazil's Prosecutor-General's Office on Friday questioned the constitutionality of President Michel Temer's proposed public spending cap and recommended that Congress shelve the austerity measures.

Russia moving nuclear-capable missiles into Kaliningrad: U.S. intelligence official
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Russia is moving nuclear-capable missiles into Kaliningrad, a tiny Russian enclave sitting between Poland and Lithuania, a U.S. intelligence official said Friday, confirming Estonian news reports.
什么时候能直接发图呀，让zerome色彩内容丰富起来 ，有时候一堆话还比不上一张图蕴含的内容直接形象。加油呀作者@

魅族并非直接使用高通生产的东西
所以比喻魅族去高通开的酒店大吃一顿完全没道理
你要用餐厅做比喻
那就是这样的
魅族去一家餐厅吃饭，餐厅老板是MTK 
魅族吃完了以后，要结账，付给MTK
结果高通跳出来说
你吃的饭里面的菜 ，里面的配方有我的专利，你要吃菜
付钱给MTK还得付钱给我
而且你要付的钱并非这个菜钱
要付你吃的所有米饭、汤，不含我配方的菜的全部费用的百分比支付给我配方费
懂比喻么？
魅族不是直接去高通开的饭店吃饭
而是饭店用了高通的配方卖给你吃
你不止要给饭店钱，还要给卖配方给饭店的高通钱
而且高通一并把你吃米饭，喝汤的钱都收了
这才叫流氓

能看到中文翻译真的很好。辛苦了。
.
有句话的意思好像不那么准哦：“使用 Bitcoin 加密 BitTorrent 网络的去中心化网站 - https://zeronet.io“
我的理解是，使用 Bitcoin 加密 BitTorrent 网络的去中心化网   ..  络..   zeronet BitTorrent network, 作为公网访问零网入口是 https://zeronet.io  
zeronet 零网内互相访问都是 http://127.0.0.1:43110/
.
这里要指出 零网作者 写得不那么严谨呀，让人会误认为是一个网站，其实是一个网络。“Decentralized websites using Bitcoin crypto and the BitTorrent network - https://zeronet.io"  
他应该写上“公网访问零网入口是 https://zeronet.io”
